root: ^Good afternoon, I am Detective Redd Rhum, I need all the information you can tell me about Cassandra Campbell. I have interviewed some people around town and several had said that she is a nurse here.
^There isn’t much I can tell you, but I’ll try my best.

s: ^Do you mind if I have a look around?

A: ^She was a great nurse, never had anyone complain about her ever. She worked under a Doctor Windsor. Now that you mention it, his old office was broken into a while back.
B: ^There were two break-ins actually. One two weeks ago and the other one this morning.  Last time someone broke in they broke into Windsor's office and took some syringes and tubes. I haven’t had the time to check what they took this morning from the storage room.
C: ^Be my guest, last time the cops they sent were clueless and couldn’t find anything. I’m glad a detective is on the case this time.
